title: REfund request still "OPEN"
body: I sent a refund request to riot about some mistakenly bought items and I have the refund token they require and I told them that but they haven't responded yet. How long do these thing usually take?

replies.body: It can take a little bit to receive a response depending on the current queue for the day.  I took a look into this for you, and can confirm your ticket has been successfully received.  As long as you have a refund token per our[ refund policy](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ), we may be able to help out with your specific issue!  Thanks for your patience!
thank you for confirming this and yes I do have a refund token left

It could take up to 3 days for them to get to your ticket due to a large backlog, but they might not be able to grant your request. What are you trying to refund? Some items cannot be refunded, or become ineligible for a refund later. Please refer to the [Content Refund FAQ article here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

Please do not submit additional tickets, and do not bump your ticket; each time you post on your ticket it is pushed to the back of the queue.

I'm trying to refund a group of 9 marks that I bought on accident. According to the refund policy I can refund a group of 9 of the same marks or 3 of the same quints as long as I have a refund token and I do.
